definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

sentences.english: And it would be foolish to bet against the People's Bank.
sentences.chinese: 而和人民银行作对就是犯傻。

sentences.english: The People's Bank made advances to commune-run factories.
sentences.chinese: 人民银行贷款给社办工厂。

sentences.english: As a result, the PBOChas de facto adopted a crawling-peg exchange-rate regime.
sentences.chinese: 因此，人民银行实际上采取爬行钉住汇率制。

sentences.english: The People's Bank of China shall strengthen the supervision and administration of the business of commercial acceptance bills.
sentences.chinese: 人民银行要加强对商业承兑汇票业务的监督管理。

sentences.english: The circulating fund of state-owned enterprises is regulated by the central bank.
sentences.chinese: 国营企业流动资金由人民银行统一管理。

sentences.english: The PBC would not have to change its operational approach to monetary policy.
sentences.chinese: 人民银行将不必改变其针对货币政策的运作手段。

sentences.english: "Don't fight the People's Bank" says that's the right strategy now.
sentences.chinese: “别和人民银行作对”按说是目前的良策。

sentences.english: Finance Minister Xie Xuren and the executive of the People's Bank of China will attend the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 财政部部长谢旭人和人民银行负责人将出席会议。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2

definition: abbr. for various central banks, notably 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] and 中央銀行|中央银行[Zhong1 yang1 Yin2 hang2]
China Banking Regulatory Commission (CBRC), abbr. for 中國銀行業監督管理委員會|中国银行业监督管理委员会[Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4]

pinyin: Guo2 jia1 Wai4 hui4 Guan3 li3 ju2

definition: Central Bank of the Republic of China (Taiwan)
Zhou Xiaochuan (1948-), PRC banker and politician, governor of People's Bank of China 中國人民銀行|中国人民银行[Zhong1 guo2 Ren2 min2 Yin2 hang2] from 2002

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Nong2 ye4 Yin2 hang2
Zhong1 guo2 Yin2 hang2 ye4 Jian1 du1 Guan3 li3 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
related.word: 中国银行业监督管理委员会

definition: Industrial and Commercial Bank of China (ICBC)
pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Gong1 shang1 Yin2 hang2
